chef.label: Chef / Caretaker
revealBeats: There was heat… and a rhythm. Stir, taste, adjust.
My hands knew cuts like music. Efficient. Careful.
People came back because it felt safe. Like home.

medic.label: Medic / Field Nurse
revealBeats: Count the breaths. Don’t stop counting.
I stayed when other people left.

mechanic.label: Mechanic / Builder
revealBeats: Hot metal. Sparks like tiny fireflies.
If it rattles, it’s wrong. If it hums, it’s right.
I fixed things because it was simpler than fixing people.

courier.label: Courier / Runaway
revealBeats: Time printed in ink. Leaving before someone could stop me.
I carried something that wasn’t mine to carry.

keyholder.label: Keyholder / Guard
revealBeats: Doors. Rules. The feeling of being trusted… or trapped.
Sometimes I unlocked the wrong door on purpose.

detective.label: Detective / Conflicted Cop
revealBeats: Names in a notebook. Lines you can’t uncross.
A badge that felt heavier every day.
I solved the wrong problem perfectly.
